alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:38PM PST until November 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island and Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Port Angeles, Sequim, and Blyn. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers tonight into Monday morning. Showers may be heavy at times decreasing visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca
